vibe_prompt: Create a digital clock with timezone selection, which sould have minimum features : display current time (hours, minutes, seconds), select from multiple timezones, 12/24 hour format toggle, auto-update every second

user_stories.title: Display Current Time
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see the current time (hours, minutes, seconds) updating every second so I can track time accurately.

user_stories.title: Timezone Selection
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to select from multiple timezones to view the time in different regions.

user_stories.title: 12/24 Hour Format Toggle
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to toggle between 12-hour and 24-hour time formats for my preference.

user_stories.title: Auto-Update Time
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the clock to automatically update every second without needing to refresh the page.

output.frontend_code:
Digital Clock

00:00:00
